basics.name: Matheus Barbosa
basics.label: Senior Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Experienced JavaScript Developer with a focus on NodeJS, Angular, ReactJS and React Native. Passionate about delivering high-performance web and mobile applications and continuously improving technical skills through innovative projects.

work.name: Mojo Trek (Contractor for Domino's Pizza)
work.summary: Maintained and enhanced back-office applications, upgraded hybrid apps to React Native, and integrated Azure Functions for better performance.
highlights: Improved app performance through React Native upgrades.
Integrated Azure Functions to reduce operational costs.
responsibilities: Managed and updated legacy JavaScript codebases.
Upgraded applications to the latest React Native version.
achievements: Reduced downtime by maintaining critical applications.
Successfully upgraded key apps without major disruptions.

work.name: Zup (Consultant for Itaú Bank)
work.summary: Led frontend architecture for micro-frontend projects, and developed internal tools using Angular 14 and Nx.
highlights: Pioneered the use of micro-frontend architecture in the project.
responsibilities: Architected and implemented micro-frontends using Nx.
Led the development of internal tools for insurance consultants.
Integrated AWS Step Functions for scalable backend services.
achievements: Increased consultant productivity with high-quality internal tools.

work.name: Zup (Consultant for Itaú Bank)
work.summary: Led the development of analytics and A/B testing, and optimized referral tool performance.
highlights: Boosted conversion rates by refining the referral landing page.
responsibilities: Developed and optimized the referral landing page.
Implemented A/B testing and monitored results.
Collaborated with backend teams for smooth data integration.
achievements: Reduced page load times and improved frontend processes.

work.name: Zup (Consultant for Itaú Bank)
work.summary: Contributed to customer engagement tool development, integrated SDKs, and supported webview integration.
highlights: Enhanced customer experience by supporting seamless webview integration.
achievements: Successfully integrated the initial version of the customer referral tool.

work.name: Allims (Consultant for DataFarm)
work.summary: Developed mobile apps for farming monitoring and specialized in offline-first applications with SQLite integration.
highlights: Launched successful farming apps on Google Play and Apple App Store.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained mobile apps using React Native.
Optimized apps for offline use with SQLite.
Supported app launches on Google Play and Apple App Store.
achievements: Improved app usability by ensuring offline functionality.
